00037 
00038 Entree& Reorienter_tetraedres::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00039 {
00040   Cerr << "Reorientation of tetrahedra for either direct..." << finl;
00041   if (dimension != 3)
00042     {
00043       Cerr << "we can not reorientate (Reorienter) in dimension " << dimension <<finl;
00044       exit();
00045     }
00046   associer_domaine(is);
00047   Domaine& dom=domaine();
00048   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(dom);
00049   Reorienter(dom);
00050   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(dom);
00051   Cerr << "Reorientation of tetrahedra... OK" << finl;
00052   return is;
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 Reorienter_tetraedres::Sens Reorienter_tetraedres::test_orientation_tetra(IntTab& les_elems, int num_element, const DoubleTab& coord_sommets) const
00057 {
00058   static const int SOM_Z = 0;
00059   static const int SOM_A = 1;
00060   static const int SOM_B = 2;
00061   static const int SOM_C = 3;
00062 
00063   const int som_Z = les_elems(num_element,SOM_Z);
00064   const int som_A = les_elems(num_element,SOM_A);
00065   const int som_B = les_elems(num_element,SOM_B);
00066   const int som_C = les_elems(num_element,SOM_C);
00067 
00068   double ZA[3], ZB[3], ZC[3], pdtvect[3], pdtscal;
00069   int k;
00070   for (k=0 ; k<dimension ; k++)
00071     {
00072       ZA[k] = coord_sommets(som_A,k) - coord_sommets(som_Z,k);
00073       ZB[k] = coord_sommets(som_B,k) - coord_sommets(som_Z,k);
00074       ZC[k] = coord_sommets(som_C,k) - coord_sommets(som_Z,k);
00075     }
00076 
00077 // calcul pdt vect ZAxZB
00078   pdtvect[0] = ZA[1]*ZB[2] - ZA[2]*ZB[1];
00079   pdtvect[1] = ZA[2]*ZB[0] - ZA[0]*ZB[2];
00080   pdtvect[2] = ZA[0]*ZB[1] - ZA[1]*ZB[0];
00081 
00082 // calcul du pdtscal pdtvect.ZC
00083   pdtscal = 0.;
00084   for (k=0 ; k<dimension ; k++)
00085     {
00086       pdtscal += pdtvect[k] * ZC[k];
00087     }
00088 
00089   if (pdtscal<0.)
00090     {
00091 // le pdt scalaire est negatif : il s'agit d'un tetraedre mal oriente
00092 #ifdef _AFFDEBUG
00093       {
00094         Process::Journal<<"  element "<<num_element<<"  indirect"<<finl;
00095       }
00096 #endif
00097       return INDIRECT;
00098     }
00099 #ifdef _AFFDEBUG
00100   {
00101     Process::Journal<<"  element "<<num_element<<"  direct"<<finl;
00102   }
00103 #endif
00104 
00105   return DIRECT;
00106 }
00107 
00108 Reorienter_tetraedres::Sens Reorienter_tetraedres::reorienter_tetra(IntTab& les_elems, int num_element) const
00109 {
00110   static const int SOM_A = 1;
00111   static const int SOM_B = 2;
00112 
00113 // pour reorienter le tetraedre, on va permuter les sommets 1 et 2
00114   int tmp;
00115   tmp = les_elems(num_element,SOM_A);
00116   les_elems(num_element,SOM_A) = les_elems(num_element,SOM_B);
00117   les_elems(num_element,SOM_B) = tmp;
00118   return DIRECT;
00119 }
00120 
00121 // 
00122 // 
00123 // 
00124 void Reorienter_tetraedres::Reorienter(Domaine& dom) const
00125 {
00126   const DoubleTab& coord_sommets = dom.coord_sommets();
00127   int nb_zones = dom.nb_zones();
00128   int iz;
00129 
00130 // on balaye les zones du domaine
00131   for(iz=0 ; iz<nb_zones ; iz++)
00132     {
00133       Zone& zone = dom.zone(iz);
00134       if (zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Tetraedre" )
00135         {
00136 // zone de tetraedres
00137           IntTab& les_elems = zone.les_elems();
00138           int nb_elems = les_elems.dimension(0);
00139           int ielem;
00140 
00141 // balaye les tetraedres
00142           for (ielem=0 ; ielem<nb_elems ; ielem++)
00143             {
00144               if (test_orientation_tetra(les_elems, ielem, coord_sommets)==INDIRECT)
00145                 {
00146 // tetraedre oriente en sens indirect -> a reorienter
00147                   reorienter_tetra(les_elems, ielem);
00148 
00149 #ifdef _AFFDEBUG
00150                   {
00151                     Process::Journal<<"  #element reoriente "<<ielem<<finl;
00152                     static const int SOM_Z = 0;  //!< indice du sommet qui servira d'origine
00153                     static const int SOM_A = 1;     //!< indice du sommet qui servira pour le premier vecteur
00154                     static const int SOM_B = 2;     //!< indice du sommet qui servira pour le second vecteur
00155                     static const int SOM_C = 3;     //!< indice du sommet qui servira pour le troisieme vecteur
00156                     const int som_Z = les_elems(ielem,SOM_Z);
00157                     const int som_A = les_elems(ielem,SOM_A);
00158                     const int som_B = les_elems(ielem,SOM_B);
00159                     const int som_C = les_elems(ielem,SOM_C);
00160                     Process::Journal<<"    somA= "<<som_A<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 2)<<finl;
00161                     Process::Journal<<"    somB= "<<som_B<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 2)<<finl;
00162                     Process::Journal<<"    somC= "<<som_C<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_C, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_C, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_C, 2)<<finl;
00163                     Process::Journal<<"    somA= "<<som_A<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 2)<<finl<<finl;
00164                     Process::Journal<<"    somZ= "<<som_Z<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 2)<<finl;
00165                     Process::Journal<<"    somA= "<<som_A<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 2)<<finl<<finl;
00166                     Process::Journal<<"    somZ= "<<som_Z<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 2)<<finl;
00167                     Process::Journal<<"    somB= "<<som_B<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 2)<<finl<<finl;
00168                     Process::Journal<<"    somZ= "<<som_Z<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 2)<<finl;
00169                     Process::Journal<<"    somC= "<<som_C<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_C, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_C, 1)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_C, 2)<<finl<<finl;
00170                   }
00171 #endif
00172                 }
00173             }
00174         }
00175     }//fin balayage zones
00176 }
